Aug. 26, 1972 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest - 1st Harton & Westoe, 2nd Broxburn. Hymn tune contest - 1st Rogerstone, 2nd Dalmellington. 10 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:25 p.m. May 8, 2013, 9:54 a.m.
